english.segment1: Someone throw your hands up. If you wanna take a chance, then. You gotta sing a little louder. Let's wake this crowd up
english.segment2: Someone throw your hands up. If you wanna take a chance, then. You gotta sing a little louder. Let's wake this crowd up
english.segment3: I got a hankering for something special. Tonight's the night it becomes official. Don't stop the rock, hold both your hands up. Show these people how to shake things up
english.segment4: I'm not sitting down 'til I'm older. And I'm not shuttin' up 'til it's over. Raise your hands and shout if you're with me. Once we start, it won't make a difference
english.segment5: If you wanna live life loud, throw your hands up. If you wanna scream and shout, let me hear you. Takin' all the fakers out if you're with me. Everybody work it, just keep living
english.segment6: I started figuring with good intentions. Listen up now, give me your attention. Don't make a sound if you don't believe me. You won't wake up, you'll just keep living
english.segment7: I'm not sitting down 'til I'm older. And I'm not shutting up 'til it's over. Raise your hands and shout if you're with me. Once we start, it won't make a difference
english.segment8: If you wanna live life loud, throw your hands up. If you wanna scream and shout, let me hear you. Taking all the fakers out if you're with me. Everybody work it, just keep living
english.segment9: Every time that I close my eyes, I catch a glimpse of the west coast sunrise. And I can tell you you're just as beautiful
english.segment10: Someone throw your hands up. If you wanna take a chance, then. You gotta sing a little louder. Let's wake this crowd up
english.segment11: Someone throw your hands up. If you wanna take a chance, then. You gotta sing a little louder. Let's wake this crowd up
english.segment12: If you wanna live life loud, throw your hands up. If you wanna scream and shout, let me hear you. Takin' all the fakers out if you're with me. Everybody work it, just keep living
